environment.GUI.views

Class Graph.GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • environment.GUI.views.Graph.GraphPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    Graph

    private class Graph.GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This Graph.GraphPanel denotes a graph on screen. This is a member of Graph and requires the elements of it to exist.
    Version:
    10/04/17
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Graph, JPanel

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int canvasHeight
      The height of the Graph.GraphPanel inside the Graph.
      private int canvasWidth
      The width of the Graph.GraphPanel inside the Graph.

      The height of the actual graph that will be displayed with in the Graph.GraphPanel.

      The width of the actual graph that will be displayed with in the Graph.GraphPanel.
      private int padding
      The percentage amount of space between the axis of the graph and the Graph.GraphPanel's borders.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Uniquely identifies this subclass of JPanel, it is Unused.
      private java.util.List<Graph.Entry> stages
      Stores snapshots of the Simulator's Station at each tick to allow a retrospective view of the simulation.
      private int xOffset
      The pixel equivalent of the padding in the horizontal direction.
      private int yOffset
      The pixel equivalent of the padding in the vertical direction.

                      java.awt.Graphics2D graphics2D)
        Draw the axis of the graph on the Graph.GraphPanel including the labels of type and maximum value.
        Parameters:

      • displayRotatedText

        private void displayRotatedText(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics2D,
                                java.lang.String text,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                double theta)
        Displays rotated text on the Graph.GraphPanel.
        Parameters:
        graphics2D - Graphics2D that is used in the Graph.GraphPanel.
        text - String to be displayed.
        x - int x coordinates of the text.
        y - int y coordinate of the text.
        theta - double angle in radians that the text will be rotated.

                      double max,
                      java.awt.Graphics2D graphics2D)
        Draws the graphs line in the Graph.GraphPanel.
        Parameters:
        values - Map that denotes the y values of the graph.
        max - double maximum value of the y axis.
        graphics2D - Graphics2D that denotes the graphics of the canvas.

      • getStatisticValue

        private double getStatisticValue(Graph.Entry entry,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends RoadUser> type)
        Retrieves the value of a Statistic filed in the specified Station based on the Graph.StatisticType from Graph.statisticTypes and the Class<? extends RoadUser> that the user specified in Graph.vehicleTypes.
        Parameters:
        entry - Station
        type - Class<? extends RoadUser>
        Returns:
        double value of that Statistic.
